title: Chris Martin & Annabelle Wallis Holiday In Paris
text:
Chris Martin & Annabelle Wallis Holiday In Paris Written by: Chaitra Published: Tuesday, October 20, 2015, 10:13 [IST] 
The Coldplay Singer Chris Martin and his English actress girlfriend were seen exchanging kisses and holidaying in Paris. Chris and Annabelle were literally dancing through the City of Love and couldn't keep their hands off each other! 
The pictures of them smooching on streets of Paris is all over the internet. Chris seems extremely happy with his new relationship and has definitely expressed his love for Wallis through dancing, kissing and laughing on the streets of Paris. 
Image Courtesy : Daily Mail 
The 38 years old singer met his Annabelle during her movie 'Come and Find me' promotions in Vancouver. Apparently Chris attended 2 dinner parties with the movie cast and the couple is believed to have got closer during the event. 
The 'Fix You' singer was not seen much by the public while he was dating the Oscar winning actress Jennifer Lawrence. According to the media reports, Chris and JLaw split twice in a period of 10 months. 
Rumours hold that Jennifer Lawrence and Chris Martin fell apart as they weren't able to make time for each other and they were seldom spotted together in 10 months of relationship. 
Chris and JLaw were heard to be together following his split up from his ex-wife Gwyneth. Gwyneth was recently seen attending the Veuve Cliquot Polo Classic in Los Angeles over the weekend. The 43 years old actress looked nothing but happy. 
While the ex-wife was having her Polo fun at Los Angeles, Chris and his new girlfriend Annabelle were spotted by the Paparazzi displaying some good P.D.A! 
Image Courtesy: Daily Mail 
Jennifer Lawrence for now is very busy with her new Gal Pal Amy Schumer. They were spotted together at many occasions, have also gone on all girls' trip and posted pictures having the wildest of wild fun. His hex-wife Gwyneth is having a ball of time with her new Director boyfriend Brad Falchuk. The actress was previously involved with Brad Pitt before she married Chris Martin. 
Though Chris Martin and Gwyneth called their marriage and end, they are in cordial terms. Chris was spotted at Gwyneth's 43rd birthday lunch post their divorce.
